full_summary:
# Tender Notice

## Title
EW038-241508 Demolition Services – Wabasca-Desmarais, AB

## Reference Number
WS4410866272-Doc4418004559

## Amendment Number
3

## Solicitation Number
WS4410866272

## Publication Date
January 29, 2024

## Tender Closing Date
February 20, 2024 2:00:00

## Amendment Date
February 19, 2024

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) acting for the end-user, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), invites bidders to submit proposals for demolition services.

## Regions of Opportunity
Alberta

## Regions of Delivery
Alberta

## Trade Agreements
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this project is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), located at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada.

## Point of Contact
Drew Fisher can be contacted at drew.fisher@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or via the solicitation URL.

# Solicitation Details

## Expected Contract Start Date
March 1, 2024

## Expected Contract End Date
May 15, 2024

## Method of Procurement
Competitive – Open bidding

## Selection Criteria
The bid with the lowest price will be selected.

## Notice URL
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18647146](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18647146)
